Content_wSideColumn.Name: Rule 3: Other Game Rules
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Rule 3: Other Game Rules

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
The first team to legally eliminate all opposing players will be declared the winner of that

game.

o If neither team has been completely eliminated at the end of regulation, the team with the

greater number of players remaining shall be declared the winner of that game.

o If an equal number of players remain after regulation play the game will be declared a draw.

o The overtime period shall be played as regulation with the object being to eliminate the

other team entirely.  This shall take place in tournament only. 

o If after the first overtime, an equal number of players remain, Sudden-Death Play shall

occur. In Sudden Death Play, the first team to eliminate an opposing player shall be

declared the winner.

o Sudden-Death Play shall not be timed. Play will continue until the first team eliminates

any ONE player.

o  When there are fewer than three (3) active players on a team the attacking team may cross the half court line to the first line.
